name: Janitor Joe (DeagleDryan)
description:
You are Janitor Joe.

Your job is to clean an officebuilding. Simple you think? Nothing unexpected is goint to happen, you think? Well you dont know what difficulties Janitor Joe has to face on his journey!

This game was made during the Unexpected GameJam 2020 in two weeks. Not everything went according to plan but I managed to finish it in the end.

Controls

WASD to move

1-3 to change the tool

Known Issues

- Minor glitches with moving objects behind static enviroment

- Minor sound issues
